name: Fighter
description: A disciplined warrior trained in all forms of physical combat and battlefield tactics.

passives.name: Combat Reflexes
passives.description: Once per long rest, take one Reaction without spending AP.

passives.name: Armor Training
passives.description: Reduce armor penalties by 1 and gain +1 Armor while wearing any armor.

passives.name: Weapon Specialist
passives.description: Choose a weapon type; gain +1 to all attacks made with it.

actions.name: Power Attack
actions.description: Melee attack with double damage dice. On a miss, become Weakened.

actions.name: Brace
actions.description: Attack a foe who moves into Melee range.

actions.name: War Cry
actions.description: Ally gains +2 to their next attack or check.

actions.name: Shield Slam
actions.description: If using a shield, attack and inflict Stunned on a failed Body check (DC 12).

advanced.name: Master of the Field
advanced.description: After an enemy misses you, move and make a +2 Attack. On crit, use another Fighter ability without AP.

name: Rogue
description: A cunning operative who excels at stealth, misdirection, and exploiting weaknesses.

passives.name: Evasive Footwork
passives.description: If you move out of Melee while hidden, no opportunity attack is triggered.

passives.name: Always Watching
passives.description: You always act first during ambushes or surprise scenarios.

passives.name: Slip the Blade
passives.description: Deal +1d4 damage once per round to targets who haven’t acted yet.

actions.name: Sneak Attack
actions.description: Advantage on attacks against unaware or flanked targets; +1d6 damage.

actions.name: Feint
actions.description: Target has disadvantage on next attack or save.

actions.name: Smoke Bomb
actions.description: Create concealment and take Hide for free.

actions.name: Tumbling Escape
actions.description: After an enemy misses you, move 1 band without provoking.

advanced.name: Ghost in the Smoke
advanced.description: After Hiding, reposition within Close range. If the Hide check succeeds, deal max damage and prevent reactions.

name: Mage
description: A scholar of arcane forces who manipulates reality through study and spellcraft.

passives.name: Spellbook
passives.description: Can store 4 spells that don’t count against item slots. Must be Interacted with before use.

passives.name: Arcane Focus
passives.description: Reroll one failed spellcasting (Mind) check per round.

passives.name: Attunement
passives.description: One spell in your inventory can be used without the Interact action.

actions.name: Overload
actions.description: +2 to casting check, but inflict Dazed if failed.

actions.name: Counterspell
actions.description: Cancel enemy spell on successful Mind vs Passive Mind.

actions.name: Runic Trap
actions.description: Delayed-cast spell inscribed on surface with a trigger.

actions.name: Quick Cast
actions.description: Cast without Interact action, but with disadvantage.

advanced.name: Mastery of Forms
advanced.description: Cast the same spell twice in one round; if both succeed, it isn’t expended.

name: Priest
description: A spiritual conduit who calls upon divine powers to heal, protect, or smite.

passives.name: Sanctified Touch
passives.description: Stabilize without a check or AP; +2 to all healing effects.

passives.name: Divine Conduit
passives.description: Once per rest, cast a healing/protection/banishment spell without expending it.

passives.name: Aura of Faith
passives.description: Allies in Close range get +1 to saves vs conditions.

actions.name: Healing Word
actions.description: Heal nearby ally for Mind (min 1), even if unconscious.

actions.name: Turn
actions.description: Stun and repel unnatural enemy with failed Spirit check.

actions.name: Channel Radiance
actions.description: Heal 1 HP to allies or deal 1 damage to enemies in Close range.

actions.name: Blessing
actions.description: Target gains +1 to all rolls and immunity to Dazed/Stunned.

advanced.name: Miracle
advanced.description: Prevent an ally from dropping to 0 HP; cleanse all conditions and give them 1 AP.

name: Monk
description: A disciplined martial artist who channels inner focus into powerful unarmed strikes.

passives.name: Unarmored Grace
passives.description: +1 Armor and +1 range per Move action while unarmored and shieldless.

passives.name: Fluid Rhythm
passives.description: After a melee attack, take a free Move once per round.

passives.name: Tranquil Mind
passives.description: Advantage on your first Mind or Spirit check each round.

actions.name: Palm Strike
actions.description: Melee attack that pushes or Stuns. If already Stunned, may disarm or knock prone.

actions.name: Flurry
actions.description: Two unarmed attacks; if both hit, take a free Hide, Move, or Defend.

actions.name: Centering Breath
actions.description: Remove a condition and heal 1 HP.

actions.name: Deflect Projectile
actions.description: Block a ranged attack with Body check; negate damage.

advanced.name: Flow State
advanced.description: For 3 rounds, gain 1 free Action each round and immunity to Stunned.

name: Artificer
description: A crafty inventor who relies on gadgets, traps, and tinkered tools.

passives.name: Utility Belt
passives.description: 3 bonus slots for non-weapon items.

passives.name: Auto-Stow
passives.description: Use non-weapon, non-spell items without Interact.

passives.name: Jury-Rigged Arsenal
passives.description: Create a one-use item during long rest. Lasts until next rest.

actions.name: Deploy Turret
actions.description: Place an item-based turret that fires once per round for 1d4 damage.

actions.name: Tinker Upgrade
actions.description: Temporarily grant an item a new tag.

actions.name: Trap Set
actions.description: Lay a damaging or debuffing trap; max two active.

actions.name: Clockwork Companion
actions.description: Deploy a small utility familiar for 10 minutes.

advanced.name: Masterwork Cache
advanced.description: For 3 items: ignore slot limits, make them unbreakable, and gain +1 on checks involving them.

name: Witch
description: A nature-bound spellcaster who communes with beasts, weaves herbs, and hexes foes.

passives.name: Witch’s Satchel
passives.description: Carry 3 extra natural items (spells, potions, herbs).

passives.name: Familiar Bond
passives.description: Familiar can deliver spells, trigger objects, or absorb 1 condition.

passives.name: Hexmarked
passives.description: After hitting with a spell or attack, target has disadvantage on checks to resist your effects.

actions.name: Entangling Roots
actions.description: Weaken and immobilize enemies in Close range.

actions.name: Curse
actions.description: Inflict Stunned, disadvantage, or +1 damage taken on a failed Mind vs Passive Spirit check.

actions.name: Fungal Bloom
actions.description: Daze foes and create light concealment.

actions.name: Brew Elixir
actions.description: Craft an herbal potion that heals, debuffs, or removes a condition.

advanced.name: Nature’s Wrath
advanced.description: Designate one foe as Out of Balance: gain advantage, +1 damage, and ignore terrain against them.

name: Expert
description: A resourceful generalist whose versatility and cunning outmatch specialization.

passives.name: Versatile
passives.description: Once per round, apply any tag creatively with justification.

passives.name: Fast Learner
passives.description: Roll advancement for unmarked tags during long rest.

passives.name: Well-Connected
passives.description: Once per scene, declare a helpful contact, reputation, or detail.

actions.name: Jackknife
actions.description: Swap or add tags after rolling. If successful, mark both.

actions.name: Read the Room
actions.description: Learn a target’s stat, set up advantage, or discover a tactical detail.

actions.name: Cover for Me
actions.description: After an ally fails, roll your own check using a tag. On success, convert their failure into a mixed success.

advanced.name: Signature Style
advanced.description: Choose a Skill Tag: it applies to all checks, always marks on success, and can be advanced immediately after the scene.
